hadith.text: Narrated 'Atiyyah:from Abu Sa'eed, that the Messenger of Allah (ï·º) said: "The Lord, Blessed and Most High is He, has said: 'Whoever is too busy with the Qur'an for remembering Me and asking Me, then I shall give him more than what I give to those who ask.' And the virtue of Allah's Speech over the speech of others is like the virtue of Allah over His creation
